fields.label: Homepage Hero Feature
fields.message: The featured exhibition that appears at the top of the homepage can be set under Exhibition --> Exhibition Options. Once you select the exhibition to feature, you can edit its landing page and its appearance on the homepage by selecting it from the All exhibitions list and revealing the “Featured exhibition options“ edit area.

sub_fields.label: Special feature image position
sub_fields.name: special_feature_image_position
sub_fields.instructions: Select the left or right position of the special feature image

sub_fields.label: Special feature image
sub_fields.name: special_feature_image
sub_fields.instructions: This image will appear on the left or right side of the main content based on your selected position. Best suitable for photographs.

sub_fields.label: Special feature content image
sub_fields.name: special_feature_image_content
sub_fields.instructions: Image added here will appear above the title in the main content area of the feature.

sub_fields.label: Special feature design options
sub_fields.message: Set the background and text colors. Please check any custom colors to ensure correct contrast ratios to meet ADA accessibility standards and to avoid potential WCAG compliance issues.

sub_fields.label: Custom Section Content
sub_fields.name: custom_section_content_repeater
sub_fields.instructions: You can add up to 2 columns of content in this section.

sub_fields.label: Custom Carousel Content
sub_fields.name: custom_carousel_section_repeater
sub_fields.instructions: Add items to your custom carousel. You can choose to feature existing site content or create a carousel card from scratch by checking the “Custom carousel card” checkbox below

sub_fields.label: Custom carousel card?
sub_fields.name: custom_carousel_section_is_custom_content
sub_fields.message: Yes, create new content that does not exist on the site

sub_fields.label: Events Section Featured Image Position
sub_fields.name: events_section_featured_image_position
sub_fields.instructions: Please select where you would like to position the Image on the callout

sub_fields.label: Hours (Title)
sub_fields.name: about_section_hours_title
sub_fields.instructions: Please note that the museum hours are set under Settings --> Museum Stats (Museum Schedule tab). The hours will be displayed under this title on the homepage.

sub_fields.label: Special Instructions
sub_fields.name: about_section_hours_copy
sub_fields.instructions: Include any special instructions for visitors regarding museum hours here

sub_fields.label: Visitor Information Links
sub_fields.name: about_section_visitor_links_repeater
sub_fields.instructions: Note, the last link you create as part of this list will be styled as a button

sub_fields.label: About Section Announcements
sub_fields.name: about_section_announcements
sub_fields.instructions: Manages the announcement messaging on the homepage.

sub_fields.label: Recommendation Sources
sub_fields.name: about_section_recommendations_repeater
sub_fields.instructions: Note that images that work/look best in this section are white PNGs with transparencies

sub_fields.label: Blog Section Title
sub_fields.name: blog_section_title
sub_fields.instructions: Note, ten latest blog entries are automatically displayed in this section

sub_fields.label: Exhibitions & Featured Content Section Title
sub_fields.name: exhibitions_section_title
sub_fields.instructions: Default header can be overwritten per carousel item if set below.

sub_fields.label: Carousel
sub_fields.name: featured_carousel_repeater
sub_fields.instructions: Select exhibitions, events or other content you would like to feature on the homepage. Note that events or exhibitions with defined end-dates will be automatically removed from the carousel after their end-date.
